mapper.insert: insert into board (article_no, parent_no, title, content, id) values ( (select NVL(max(article_no), 0) +1 from board), #{parentNo}, #{title}, #{content}, #{id} )
mapper.select: select level, article_no, parent_no, title, content, id , created_at, views from board start with parent_no = 0 connect by prior article_no = parent_no order siblings by article_no desc
mapper.update: update board set views = views + 1 where article_no = #{articleNo}
mapper.select: select * from( select level, article_no, parent_no, title, content, id , created_at, views from board start with parent_no = 0 connect by prior article_no = parent_no order siblings by article_no desc ) offset #{displayArticle} rows fetch first #{articleNum} rows only
